caption: Check blood pressure

recommendation: patients with two consecutive blood pressure readings greater than 140/90 should have a diagnosis of hypertension
caption: Possible hypertension
description: Patient has 2 blood pressure readings over 140/90 which indicates hypertension
notes: rule doesnt stipulate how far apart the measurements should be

recommendation: if a patient has a hypertension diagnosis, they should also have a hypertension grade
caption: Missing hypertension grade
description: Need to grade the hypertension to help decide on the management options
notes: this rule isnt required if grade is automatically calculated

caption: Check blood glucose
description: Patients with hypertension should have their blood glucose measured at least once a year
notes: FBS - If more than 126 mg/dl - check for symptoms - If positive - diabetes, if symptoms negative need to repeat the FBS or do HbA1c.  needs to also check for resting blood sugar and hba1c (one is sufficient)

caption: Order lipid panel
description: Patients with hypertension should have their lipid panel done at least once a year
notes: Lipid panel - Total cholseterol will be important in calculating the CVD risk score. Need to get the total cholesterol value in mmols. If any of the lipid components is high, refer to the lipid guideline

caption: Order serum creatinine
description: Patients with hypertension should have their serum creatinine measured at least once a year
notes: S. Creatinine + eGFR - If the eGFR is above 60 - can start any medication as planned, if the eGFR is low need to be cautious on the medications. Also, need to prompt to check the eGFR again in 3 weeks and decide whether the patient is having CKD, If the eGFR is <45, may need to confirm the value with a repeat test and refer the patient to the nephrologist

caption: Order urinalysis
description: Patients with hypertension should have urinalysis at least once a year
notes: Urinalysis - Check for urine protein / albumin - if present there may be hypertension mediated organ damage or chronic kidney disease. Need to check urine albumen creatinine ratio

caption: Order ECG
description: Patients with hypertension should have an ECG
notes: Check for evidence of ischemia - need urgent referral, Evidence of left ventricular hypertrophy - need referral
